reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Taketoritei Maruyama onsen resort at Arima is a traditional service oriented resort in the best tradition of Japan.
reviews.title: Best of the Best - deserves 10 Stars

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Service and guest satisfaction is the goal of all the staff, who are very energetic and accommodating. The staff go to extra lengths to ensure guests are welcome, satisfied and happy and they have great pride in the resort. Language is not a barrier for non Japanese guests, as the staff are trained to communicate in English.
reviews.title: Relaxing getaway destination
